exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Enhancement
exterior.description: Enhance the curb appeal by adding new plants, flowers, and shrubs. Consider a mix of perennials and annuals for year-round beauty. Add a small water feature or garden lighting to create a welcoming atmosphere.

exterior.title: Deck and Patio Upgrade
exterior.description: Upgrade the existing deck with new materials or expand it to create a larger outdoor living space. Add a pergola or gazebo for shade and style. Consider using composite materials for durability.

exterior.title: Exterior Paint and Siding Refresh
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house or refresh the siding to give it a new look. Choose colors that complement the natural surroundings and enhance the architectural features of the home.

exterior.title: Driveway and Walkway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway and walkways to improve functionality and appearance. Consider using stamped concrete or pavers for a more attractive finish.

exterior.title: Front Porch Revamp
exterior.description: Update the front porch with new railings, lighting, and seating. Add decorative elements like planters or a new door to enhance the entrance.

living area.title: Floor Refinishing
living area.description: Refinish the hardwood floors to enhance their natural beauty and increase the property's appeal. This involves sanding, staining, and sealing the floors to give them a fresh, updated look.

living area.title: Paint Refresh
living area.description: Repaint the walls in a modern, neutral color palette to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers. This simple update can significantly enhance the overall look of the living area.

living area.title: Lighting Upgrade
living area.description: Install modern, energy-efficient lighting fixtures to replace outdated ones. This includes adding dimmable LED lights and stylish chandeliers to improve ambiance and energy efficiency.

living area.title: Fireplace Update
living area.description: Update the fireplace with a new mantel and surround. Consider a sleek, modern design to make it a focal point in the living room, enhancing both aesthetics and functionality.

living area.title: Open Concept Conversion
living area.description: Remove non-load-bearing walls to create an open-concept living and dining area. This modern layout is highly desirable and can significantly increase the property's value.

bath.title: Upgrade Bathroom Fixtures
bath.description: Replace outdated faucets, showerheads, and cabinet hardware with modern, water-efficient fixtures. This will enhance the bathroom's aesthetic and improve water efficiency.

bath.title: Install Heated Flooring
bath.description: Add electric heated flooring under the existing tiles to increase comfort and appeal, especially in colder climates like Ontario.

bath.title: Refresh Paint and Wallpaper
bath.description: Repaint the walls with a neutral color and update the wallpaper to a more modern design. This will refresh the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

bath.title: Convert Tub to Walk-in Shower
bath.description: Replace the existing bathtub with a walk-in shower featuring glass doors. This modernizes the bathroom and is highly desirable for many buyers.

bath.title: Add Energy-Efficient Lighting
bath.description: Install LED lighting fixtures to improve energy efficiency and enhance the bathroom's ambiance.

other.title: Add a Folding Station
other.description: Install a folding station above the washer and dryer to maximize space and functionality. This can be a simple wooden or laminate countertop that provides a convenient area for folding clothes.

other.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
other.description: Replace the existing lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lights. This will enhance the room's appearance and improve energy efficiency.

other.title: Install Open Shelving
other.description: Add open shelving above the sink area for additional storage and display space. This can be used for storing laundry supplies or decorative items.

other.title: Add a Backsplash
other.description: Install a stylish backsplash behind the sink area to add visual interest and protect the walls from water damage. Choose a material that complements the existing decor.

other.title: Replace Cabinet Hardware
other.description: Update the cabinet hardware with modern handles and knobs to give the room a fresh look. This is a simple and cost-effective way to update the space.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refinishing
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing cabinets to give them a fresh, modern look. This involves sanding, painting, or staining the cabinets to match current trends, enhancing the kitchen's appeal without a full remodel.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lights. Consider adding under-cabinet lighting to improve functionality and ambiance.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Update
kitchen.description: Install a new backsplash with contemporary tiles to add visual interest and modernize the kitchen space. This can be a DIY project with the right tools and materials.

kitchen.title: Hardware Replacement
kitchen.description: Update cabinet and drawer hardware with modern designs. This simple change can significantly enhance the kitchen's aesthetic appeal.

kitchen.title: Countertop Replacement
kitchen.description: Replace the existing countertops with quartz or granite for a high-end look. This upgrade can greatly increase the kitchen's value and appeal to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Add Built-in Wardrobes
bedroom.description: Install built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space and enhance the room's functionality. This will provide a modern look and increase the appeal to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. This will improve the ambiance and energy efficiency of the room.

bedroom.title: Refinish Hardwood Floors
bedroom.description: Refinish the existing hardwood floors to restore their original beauty and add value to the home. This will enhance the overall aesthetic of the bedrooms.

bedroom.title: Paint Walls with Neutral Colors
bedroom.description: Repaint the walls with neutral colors to create a fresh and inviting atmosphere. Neutral tones appeal to a wider range of buyers and make spaces feel larger.

bedroom.title: Install New Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Add new window treatments such as blinds or curtains to enhance privacy and style. This can also improve energy efficiency by better insulating the windows.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Waterproofing
unfinished basement.description: Seal cracks and apply waterproofing paint to prevent moisture issues. Install a sump pump if necessary to protect against flooding.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Finishing
unfinished basement.description: Transform the unfinished basement into a livable space. Add drywall, flooring, and lighting to create a functional area such as a family room or home office.

unfinished basement.title: Upgrade Electrical Panel
unfinished basement.description: Ensure the electrical panel is up to code and capable of handling modern electrical demands. This is crucial for safety and future-proofing the home.

unfinished basement.title: Energy-Efficient HVAC Upgrade
unfinished basement.description: Upgrade the HVAC system to a more energy-efficient model. This will improve energy consumption and appeal to eco-conscious buyers.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Egress Window Installation
unfinished basement.description: Install an egress window to ensure safety and compliance with building codes. This also adds natural light to the basement space.
